name: AIT Big Data Initiative
body:
### Welcome 

The AIT Big Data Initiative, is a group of like minded individuals, loosely led by [Chirag Nagpal](www.chiragnagpal.com), consisting of students from Second and Third Year of Engineering at [Army Institute of Technology](www.aitpune.com)

### What We Do

Currently, we are involved with the development of large scalable clusters, for massive data mining. We plan to utilise aggregated data for analytics and research. If the terms 'Machine Learning', 'Big Data', 'Web Intelligence' are familiar to you, we would be interested in hearing from you.

### How To Join Us ?

Simple, just contact Chirag Nagpal, Third Year, Computer Engineering during College or at 008A, OBH or why not just drop by at the OSS Club next to the registrar's office after college ? ;)

### Group Members
Here is a list of active members in (no particular order)

Second Year:
* Anurag Mishra @anuragmishracse
* Aayush Yadav
* Aman Gill
